mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into hospital_user_t (user_login_name, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_idcard, user_roleid, user_last_login_time, creat_time, last_modify_time, data_state) values (#{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataState,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update hospital_user_t set user_login_name = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_idcard = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_roleid = #{userRoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_last_login_time = #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_state = #{dataState,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_login_name, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_idcard, user_roleid, user_last_login_time, creat_time, last_modify_time, data_state from hospital_user_t where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, user_login_name, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_idcard, user_roleid, user_last_login_time, creat_time, last_modify_time, data_state from hospital_user_t where
user_idcard like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
or
user_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select id, user_login_name, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_idcard, user_roleid, user_last_login_time, creat_time, last_modify_time, data_state from hospital_user_t where user_login_name = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, user_login_name, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_idcard, user_roleid, user_last_login_time, creat_time, last_modify_time, data_state from hospital_user_t

select id, user_login_name, user_password, user_name, user_sex, user_idcard, user_roleid, user_last_login_time, creat_time, last_modify_time, data_state from hospital_user_t where user_login_name = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
